title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.43 - Smoking within 50 feet of tank vehicle prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.43 - Smoking within 50 feet of tank vehicle prohibited

State Regulations

Smoking by any person on or within 50 feet of a tank
vehicle or refueling service vehicle is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
